verses.verse: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show unto his servants, even the things which must shortly come to pass: and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John;
who <WG3739> bare witness<WG3140> of the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> of the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, even<WG5037> of all things that<WG3745> he saw<WG1492>.

Blessed <WG3107> is he that readeth<WG314>, and<WG2532> they that hear<WG191> the words<WG3056> of the prophecy<WG4394>, and<WG2532> keep<WG5083> the things that are written<WG1125> therein<WG1722>: <WG846> for<WG1063> the time<WG2540> is at hand<WG1451>.

John <WG2491> to the<WG1577> seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577> that are in<WG1722> Asia<WG773>: Grace<WG5485> to you<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515>, from<WG575> him who is<WG5607> and<WG2532> who was<WG2258> and<WG2532> who is to come<WG2064>; and<WG2532> from<WG575> the<WG4151> seven<WG2033> Spirits<WG4151> that<WG3739> are<WG2076> before<WG1799> his<WG846> throne<WG2362>;

and <WG2532> from<WG575> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, who is the faithful<WG4103> witness<WG3144>, the firstborn<WG4416> of<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, and<WG2532> the ruler<WG758> of the kings<WG935> of the earth<WG1093>. Unto him that loveth<WG25> us<WG2248>, and<WG2532> loosed<WG3068> us<WG2248> from<WG575> our<WG2257> sins<WG266> by<WG1722> his<WG846> blood<WG129>;

and <WG2532> he made<WG4160> us<WG2248> to be a kingdom<WG935>, <WG2532> to be priests<WG2409> unto his<WG846> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962>; to him<WG846> be the glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> the dominion<WG2904> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.

Behold <WG2400>, he cometh<WG2064> with<WG3326> the clouds<WG3507>; and<WG2532> every<WG3956> eye<WG3788> shall see<WG3700> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> they that<WG3748> pierced<WG1574> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the tribes<WG5443> of the earth<WG1093> shall mourn<WG2875> over<WG1909> him<WG846>. Even so<WG3483>, Amen<WG281>.

I <WG1473> am<WG1510> the Alpha<WG1> and<WG2532> the Omega<WG5598>, saith<WG3004> the Lord<WG2962> God<WG5607>, who is and<WG2532> who was<WG2258> and<WG2532> who is to come<WG2064>, the Almighty<WG3841>.

I <WG1473> John<WG2491>, <WG2532> your<WG5216> brother<WG80> and<WG2532> partaker<WG4791> with you in<WG1722> the tribulation<WG2347> and2532, 1722 kingdom<WG932> and<WG2532> patience<WG5281> which are in<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>, was<WG1096> in<WG1722> the isle<WG3520> that is called<WG2564> Patmos<WG3963>, for<WG1223> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> and2532, 1223 the testimony<WG3141> of<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>.

I was<WG1096> in<WG1722> the Spirit<WG4151> on<WG1722> the<WG2250> Lord<WG2960>'s day<WG2250>, and<WG2532> I heard<WG191> behind<WG3694> me<WG3450> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, as<WG5613> of a trumpet<WG4536>

saying <WG3004>, What<WG3739> thou seest<WG991>, write<WG1125> in<WG1473> a book<WG975> and<WG2532> send<WG3992> it to the seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577>: unto<WG1519> Ephesus<WG2181>, and<WG2532> unto<WG1519> Smyrna<WG4667>, and<WG2532> unto<WG1519> Pergamum<WG4010>, and<WG2532> unto<WG1519> Thyatira<WG2363>, and<WG2532> unto<WG1519> Sardis<WG4554>, and<WG2532> unto<WG1519> Philadelphia<WG5359>, and<WG2532> unto<WG1519> Laodicea<WG2993>.

And <WG2532> I turned<WG1994> to see<WG991> the voice<WG5456> that<WG3748> spake<WG2980> with<WG3326> me<WG1700>. And<WG2532> having turned<WG1994> I saw<WG1492> seven<WG2033> golden candlesticks<WG5552>;

and <WG2532> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG2033> candlesticks<WG3087> one like<WG3664> unto a son<WG5207> of man<WG444>, clothed<WG1746> with a garment down to the foot<WG4158>, and<WG2532> girt<WG4024> about<WG4314> at the breasts<WG3149> with a golden<WG5552> girdle<WG2223>.

And <WG2532> his<WG846> head<WG2776> and<WG2532> his hair<WG2359> were white<WG3022> as<WG5613> white wool<WG2053>, white<WG3022> as snow<WG5510>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> eyes<WG3788> were as<WG5613> a flame<WG5395> of fire<WG1161>;

and <WG2532> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> like<WG3664> unto burnished brass<WG5474>, as if<WG5613> it had been refined<WG4448> in<WG1722> a furnace<WG2575>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> voice<WG5456> as<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of<WG5204> many<WG4183> waters<WG5204>.

And <WG2532> he had<WG2192> in<WG1722> his<WG846> right<WG1188> hand<WG5495> seven<WG2033> stars<WG792>: and<WG2532> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> proceeded<WG1607> a sharp<WG3691> two-edged<WG1366> sword<WG4501>: and<WG2532> his<WG846> countenance<WG3799> was as<WG5613> the sun<WG2246> shineth<WG5316> in<WG1722> his<WG846> strength<WG1411>.

And <WG2532> when<WG3753> I saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, I fell<WG4098> at<WG4314> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> as<WG5613> one dead<WG3498>. And<WG2532> he laid<WG2007> his<WG846> right<WG1188> hand<WG5495> upon<WG1909> me<WG1691>, saying<WG3004>, <WG3427> Fear<WG5399> not<WG3361>; I<WG1473> am<WG1510> the first<WG4413> and<WG2532> the last<WG2078>,

and <WG2532> the Living<WG2198> one<WG2532>; and I was<WG1096> dead<WG3498>, and<WG2532> behold<WG2400>, I am<WG1510> alive<WG2198> for<WG1519> evermore<WG165>, <WG281> and<WG2532> I have<WG2192> the keys<WG2807> of death<WG2532> and<WG2532> of Hades<WG86>.

Write <WG1125> therefore the things which<WG3739> thou sawest<WG1492>, and<WG2532> the things which<WG3739> are<WG1526>, and<WG2532> the things which<WG3739> shall<WG3195> come to pass1096, 3326 hereafter<WG5023>;

the mystery<WG3466> of the seven<WG2033> stars<WG792> which<WG3739> thou sawest<WG1492> in<WG1909> my<WG3450> right hand<WG1188>, and<WG2532> the seven<WG2033> golden<WG5552> candlesticks<WG3087>. The seven<WG2033> stars<WG792> are<WG1526> the angels<WG32> of the seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577>: and<WG2532> the seven<WG2033> candlesticks3087, 3739, 1492 are<WG1526> seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577>.
